caption: This photograph captures a stunning natural landscape during what appears to be either dusk or dawn. The scene features a large body of water in the foreground, reflecting a gentle light. Stretching across the horizon are majestic mountains bathed in a soft pink and orange light, indicating the sun is low in the sky. The light highlights the textures and contours of the mountains, enhancing their visual impact. Above the mountains, the sky is filled with a mix of soft purple and pink hues, contributing to the serene and tranquil atmosphere of the scene. There is a distinctive rainbow or light beam on the right side, adding a mystical element to the overall composition. No human figures or man-made structures are visible; the focus is entirely on the natural beauty of the environment.
title: The lake range at sunset. The lake range defines the eastern shore of Pyramid Lake.
